column1: 323111,Aircraft Maintenance Engineer (Avionics),,"Install electrical components, equipment or systems
column3: Test electrical equipment or systems to ensure proper functioning
column7: Confer with co-workers or internal stakeholders to coordinate operational activities
column9: Assemble electrical components, subsystems or systems
column11: Lay out work according to specifications
column13: Analyse test or performance data to assess equipment operation
column15: Troubleshoot equipment or systems operation problems
column19: Repair worn, damaged, or defective mechanical parts
column21: Install machine or equipment replacement parts
